name: To The Moon (itch) (Nocktalink)
description:
You are fighting against the moon !
Why ? I dont know but you have to avoid it's attack

Use the ARROWS to move and SPACE to fire
Press ESC to quit

This game was made for the touhou-jam-7
The theme was the name of one music from the touhou games
I got Broken Moon as theme

I made a bullet hell where the boss is in the middle with 3 majors phases
I'm not a touhou expert so I hope i did a good job making something a bit similar '^^
There is no sound effect and animation for now I couldn't implement them in time

I don't own any of the music. The credits go to the respective owners.
